item.title: An Ode to Pocket: Analysis of Exported Logs
item.description: Pocket is a service for saving links for later reading. It shuts down tomorrow, July 8th RIP. Inspired by noperator’s post, I decided to use Claude Code to analyze my exports as well. First some basic facts about my Pocket archive: 1,530 articles saved between January 2020 and May 2025. That’s about 306 articles per year, or roughly 6 articles per week. Not too shabby when I feel like I’m always behind on my reading backlog.
